trans-unit.source: Setting flex: initial resets the item to the initial values of Flexbox. This is the same as flex: 0 1 auto. In this case the value of flex-grow is 0, so items will not grow larger than their flex-basis size. The value of flex-shrink is 1, so items can shrink if they need to rather than overflowing. The value of flex-basis is auto. Items will either use any size set on the item in the main dimension, or they will get their size from the content size.
trans-unit.target: 设置 flex: initial 将项目重置为Flexbox的初始值。这与 flex: 0 1 auto 。在这种情况下， flex-grow 的值为0，因此项目的增长不会超过其 flex-basis 的大小。的价值 flex-shrink 为1，因此，如果他们需要，而不是溢出项目可以缩小。 flex-basis 的值是 auto 。项目将使用在主维度上项目上设置的任何大小，或者从内容大小中获取它们的大小。

trans-unit.source: Setting CSS properties to specific values is the core function of the CSS language. A property and value pair is called a declaration, and any CSS engine calculates which declarations apply to every single element of a page in order to appropriately lay it out, and to style it.

Setting the font size in pixel values (px) is a good choice when you need pixel accuracy. A px value is static. This is an OS-independent and cross-browser way of literally telling the browsers to render the letters at exactly the number of pixels in height that you specified. The results may vary slightly across browsers, as they may use different algorithms to achieve a similar effect.
trans-unit.target: 当需要像素精度时，以像素值（ px ）设置字体大小是一个不错的选择。px值是静态的。这是一种独立于操作系统且跨浏览器的方式，从字面上告诉浏览器以您指定的高度的像素数为单位呈现字母。不同浏览器的结果可能略有不同，因为它们可能使用不同的算法来达到类似的效果。

trans-unit.source: Since pseudo-elements are not simple selectors, they are not valid arguments to :not(); thus, selectors like :not(p::before) will not work.

Since text that has been scaled down to fit a mobile screen may be very small, many mobile browsers apply a text inflation algorithm to enlarge the text to make it more readable. When an element containing text uses 100% of the screen's width, the algorithm increases its text size, but without modifying the layout. The text-size-adjust property allows web authors to disable or modify this behavior, as web pages designed with small screens in mind do not need it.
trans-unit.target: 由于已按比例缩小以适合移动屏幕的文本可能很小，因此许多移动浏览器都使用文本填充算法来放大文本以使其更具可读性。当包含文本的元素使用屏幕宽度的100％时，该算法将增加其文本大小，但不修改布局。在 text-size-adjust 属性允许网页制作者禁用或修改此行为，如网页设计时考虑到小屏幕并不需要它。

trans-unit.source: Since the timing of the animation is defined in the CSS style that configures the animation, keyframes use a <percentage> to indicate the time during the animation sequence at which they take place. 0% indicates the first moment of the animation sequence, while 100% indicates the final state of the animation. Because these two times are so important, they have special aliases: from and to. Both are optional. If from/0% or to/100% is not specified, the browser starts or finishes the animation using the computed values of all attributes.
trans-unit.target: 由于动画的时间安排是通过配置动画的CSS样式定义的，因此关键帧使用 <percentage> 来指示动画序列中发生动画的时间。 0％指示动画序列的第一时刻，而100％指示动画的最终状态。由于这两次非常重要，因此它们具有特殊的别名： from 和 to 。两者都是可选的。如果 from / 0% 或 to / 100% 没有指定，浏览器启动或使用完的所有属性的计算的值的动画。

trans-unit.source: Slant (represented by the slnt tag), or as it's often referred to, 'oblique' — is different to true italics in that it changes the angle of the letterforms but doesn’t perform any kind of character substitution. It is also variable, in that it is expressed as a numeric range. This allows the font to be varied anywhere along that axis. The allowed range is generally 0 (upright) to 20 degrees — any number value along that range can be supplied, so the font can be slanted just a tiny bit. However, any value from -90–90 degrees is valid.
trans-unit.target: 倾斜（由 slnt 标签表示），或者通常被称为“倾斜”，与真正的斜体不同，因为它会改变字母形状的角度，但不执行任何类型的字符替换。它也是可变的，因为它表示为数字范围。这允许字体沿该轴的任何位置变化。允许的范围通常是0（垂直）到20度-可以提供该范围内的任何数字值，因此字体可以稍微倾斜一点。但是，-90–90度之间的任何值都是有效的。

trans-unit.source: So far, other than items we have specifically placed, grid is always progressing forward and keeping items in DOM order. This is generally what you want, if you are laying out a form for example you wouldn’t want the labels and fields to become jumbled up in order to fill in some gap. However sometimes, we are laying things out that don’t have a logical order and we would like to create a layout that doesn’t have gaps in it.

Some animations can be helpful such as to guide users to understand what actions are expected, to show relationships within the user interface, and to inform users as to what actions have occurred. Animations can help reduce cognitive load, prevent change blindness, and establish better recall in spatial relationships. However, some animations can be problematic for people with cognitive concerns such as Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) and certain kinds of motion can be a trigger for Vestibular disorders, epilepsy, and migraine and Scotopic sensitivity.

Some browsers let users modify the user-agent stylesheet. Although some constraints on user-agent stylesheets are set by the HTML specification, browsers still have a lot of latitude: that means that significant differences exist from one browser to another. To simplify the development process, Web developers often use a CSS reset style sheet, forcing common properties values to a known state before beginning to make alterations to suit their specific needs.
trans-unit.target: 一些浏览器允许用户修改用户代理样式表。虽然HTML规范对用户代理样式表设置了一些限制,但浏览器仍然有很大的自由度:这意味着不同的浏览器之间存在很大的差异。为了简化开发过程,Web开发人员经常使用CSS重置样式表,在开始进行修改以适应他们的特定需求之前,强制将通用属性值恢复到已知状态。

trans-unit.source: Something that you will run into when creating shapes from an image is that the image you use must be CORS compatible. An image hosted on the same domain as your site should work, however if your images are hosted on a different domain such as on a CDN you should ensure that they are sending the correct headers to enable them to be used for Shapes. Due to this requirement for CORS compatible images, if you are previewing your file locally without using a local web server, your shape will not work.
trans-unit.target: 从图像创建形状时会遇到的问题是，您使用的图像必须与CORS兼容。与站点位于同一域中的图像应该可以工作，但是，如果图像位于CDN等不同的域中，则应确保它们发送正确的标头，以使其可用于Shapes。由于对CORS兼容图像有此要求，如果在不使用本地Web服务器的情况下在本地预览文件，则形状将无法工作。

trans-unit.source: Something to consider about these anonymous boxes is that they inherit styles from their direct parent, but you cannot change how they look by targeting the anonymous box. Something to note as we create this layout is that we haven’t needed to explicitly position every element on the grid at each breakpoint. We have been able to inherit the placement set up for earlier breakpoints – an advantage of working “mobile first”. We are also able to take advantage of grid auto-placement. By keeping elements in a logical order, auto-placement does quite a lot of work for us in placing items onto the grid. In the final example in this guide we will create a layout that entirely relies on auto-placement.
trans-unit.target: 创建此布局时要注意的一点是，我们不需要在每个断点处将网格上的每个元素都明确地定位。我们已经能够继承为较早的断点设置的放置-“移动优先”的优势。我们还能够利用网格自动放置的优势。通过将元素保持在逻辑顺序中，自动放置对我们将项目放置到网格上的工作量很大。在本指南的最后一个示例中，我们将创建一个完全依赖自动放置的布局。

trans-unit.source: Specificity
trans-unit.target: Specificity

trans-unit.source: Specificity Calculator: An interactive website to test and understand your own CSS rules - https://specificity.keegan.st/
trans-unit.target: 特异性计算器：用于测试和了解您自己的CSS规则的交互式网站-https: //specificity.keegan.st/

trans-unit.source: Specificity is a weight that is applied to a given CSS declaration, determined by the number of each selector type in the matching selector. When multiple declarations have equal specificity, the last declaration found in the CSS is applied to the element. Specificity only applies when the same element is targeted by multiple declarations. As per CSS rules, directly targeted elements will always take precedence over rules which an element inherits from its ancestor.

Specificity is a weight that is applied to a given CSS declaration, determined by the number of each selector type in the matching selector. When multiple declarations have equal specificity, the last declaration found in the CSS is applied to the element. Specificity only applies when the same element is targeted by multiple declarations. As per CSS rules, directly targeted elements will always take precedence over rules which an element inherits from its ancestor.
trans-unit.target: 特异性是应用于给定CSS声明的权重，它由匹配选择器中每种选择器类型的数量决定。当多个声明具有相同的特异性时，将在CSS中找到的最后一个声明应用于该元素。特异性仅在多个声明针对同一元素时适用。根据CSS规则，直接定位的元素将始终优先于元素从其祖先继承的规则。

trans-unit.source: Specificity is based on the form of a selector. In the following case, the selector *[id="foo"] counts as an attribute selector for the purpose of determining the selector's specificity, even though it selects an ID.
trans-unit.target: 特异性基于选择器的形式。在以下情况下，即使选择器 *[id="foo"] 选择了ID，它也仍被视为属性选择器，以决定选择器的特异性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies text-shadow as animatable.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a CSS shape including circle(), ellipse(), inset(), polygon(), or path().
trans-unit.target: 指定CSS形状，包括 circle() ， ellipse() ， inset() ， polygon() 或 path() 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a <symbol> that is appended to the marker representation. It may be a <string>, <image>, or <custom-ident>.
trans-unit.target: 指定附加到标记表示形式的 <symbol> 。它可以是 <string> ， <image> 或 <custom-ident> 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a <symbol> that is prepended to the marker representation. It may be a <string>, <image>, or <custom-ident>.
trans-unit.target: 指定在标记表示形式之前的 <symbol> 。它可以是 <string> ， <image> 或 <custom-ident> 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a feature name that will work with the annotation() functional notation of font-variant-alternates. An annotation feature value definition allows only one value: ident1: 2 is valid, but ident2: 2 4 isn't.
trans-unit.target: 指定将与 font-variant-alternates 的 annotation() 功能符号一起使用的功能名称。注释要素值定义仅允许一个值： ident1: 2 有效，而 ident2: 2 4 无效。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a feature name that will work with the character-variant() functional notation of font-variant-alternates. A character-variant feature value definition allows either one or two values: ident1: 3 maps to cv03=1, and ident2: 2 4 maps to cv02=4, but ident2: 2 4 5 is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 指定将与 font-variant-alternates 的 character-variant() 功能符号一起使用的功能名称。字符变量特征值定义允许一个或两个值： ident1: 3 映射到 cv03=1 ，并且 ident2: 2 4 映射到 cv02=4 ，但是 ident2: 2 4 5 无效。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a feature name that will work with the ornaments() functional notation of font-variant-alternates. An ornaments feature value definition allows only one value: ident1: 2 is valid, but ident2: 2 4 isn't.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个功能名称，该功能名称将与 font-variant-alternates 的 ornaments() 功能符号一起使用。装饰物特征值定义仅允许一个值： ident1: 2 有效，而 ident2: 2 4 无效。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a feature name that will work with the styleset() functional notation of font-variant-alternates. A stylset feature value definition allows an unlimited number of values: ident1: 2 4 12 1 maps to the OpenType values ss02, ss04, ss12, and ss01. Note that values higher than 99 are valid, but don't map to any OpenType values and are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 指定将与 font-variant-alternates 的 styleset() 功能符号一起使用的功能名称。样式集特征值定义允许无限数量的值： ident1: 2 4 12 1 映射到OpenType值 ss02 ， ss04 ， ss12 和 ss01 。请注意，大于 99 的值是有效的，但不会映射到任何OpenType值，并且将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a feature name that will work with the stylistic() functional notation of font-variant-alternates. A stylistic feature value definition allows only one value: ident1: 2 is valid, but ident2: 2 4 isn't.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个功能名称，该功能名称将与 font-variant-alternates 的 stylistic() 功能符号一起使用。样式特征值定义仅允许一个值： ident1: 2 有效，而 ident2: 2 4 无效。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a feature name that will work with the swash() functional notation of font-variant-alternates. A swash feature value definition allows only one value: ident1: 2 is valid, but ident2: 2 4 isn't.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个功能名称，该功能名称将与 font-variant-alternates 的 swash() 功能符号一起使用。 ident1: 2 特征值定义仅允许一个值：ident1：2有效，而 ident2: 2 4 无效。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a function to define how intermediate values for properties are computed. Timing functions determine how intermediate values of the transition are calculated. Most timing functions can be specified by providing the graph of the corresponding function, as defined by four points defining a cubic bezier. You can also choose easing from Easing Functions Cheat Sheet.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个函数来定义如何计算属性的中间值。时序函数确定如何计算过渡的中间值。大多数时序函数可以通过提供相应函数的图来指定，如定义三次方贝塞尔曲线的四个点所定义。您也可以从“ 缓动功能备忘单”中选择缓动。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a more condensed font face than normal, with ultra-condensed as the most condensed.
Specifies a more condensed font face than normal, with ultra-condensed as the most condensed.
trans-unit.target: 指定比正常情况下更精简的字面,超精简为最精简。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a more expanded font face than normal, with ultra-expanded as the most expanded.
Specifies a more expanded font face than normal, with ultra-expanded as the most expanded.
trans-unit.target: 指定比正常情况下更膨胀的字面,超膨胀为最膨胀。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a name that will be used as the font face value for font properties.
trans-unit.target: 指定将作为字体属性的字面值的名称。

trans-unit.target: 指定一个正常的字型。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a normal font face; each of the longhand properties has an initial value of normal. Longhand properties of font-variant are: font-variant-caps, font-variant-numeric, font-variant-alternates, font-variant-ligatures, and font-variant-east-asian.

Specifies a normal font face; each of the longhand properties has an initial value of normal. Longhand properties of font-variant are: font-variant-caps, font-variant-numeric, font-variant-alternates, font-variant-ligatures, and font-variant-east-asian.
trans-unit.target: 指定普通字体；每个长期属性都具有正常的初始值。 font-variant 的长期特性是： font-variant-caps ， font-variant-numeric ， font-variant-alternates ， font-variant-ligatures 和 font-variant-east-asian 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a special state of the selected element(s).
Specifies a starting snap-point followed by the interval between all snap-points.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个起始快照点,然后是所有快照点之间的间隔。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a symbol that should be prepended to the marker representation. Prefixes are added to the representation in the final stage, so in the final representation of the counter, it comes before the negative sign.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个应在标记表示中加前缀的符号。前缀是在最后阶段添加到表示中的,所以在计数器的最后表示中,它在负号之前。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a system to fall back into if either the specified system is unable to construct the representation of a counter value or if the counter value outside the specified range. If the specified fallback also fails to represent the value, then the fallback style's fallback is used, if one is specified. If there are either no fallback systems described or if the chain of fallback systems are unable to represent a counter value, then it will ultimately fall back to the decimal style.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个系统,如果指定的系统无法构造计数器值的表示,或者如果计数器值在指定的范围之外,则指定回退系统。如果指定的回退系统也不能表示该值,则使用回退样式的回退系统(如果指定了)。如果没有所述的回落系统,或者回落系统链无法表示计数器值,那么最终将回落到十进制样式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an external reference consisting of a <url>, followed by an optional hint using the format() function to describe the format of the font resource referenced by that URL. The format hint contains a comma-separated list of format strings that denote well-known font formats. If a user agent doesn't support the specified formats, it skips downloading the font resource. If no format hints are supplied, the font resource is always downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个外部引用，该引用由 <url> 组成，后跟可选的提示，使用 format() 函数描述该URL引用的字体资源的格式。格式提示包含逗号分隔的格式字符串列表，这些字符串表示众所周知的字体格式。如果用户代理不支持指定的格式，它将跳过下载字体资源。如果未提供格式提示，则始终下载字体资源。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an external reference consisting of a <url>, followed by an optional hint using the format() function to describe the format of the font resource referenced by that URL. The format hint contains a comma-separated list of format strings that denote well-known font formats. If a user agent doesn't support the specified formats, it skips downloading the font resource. If no format hints are supplied, the font resource is always downloaded.
Specifies behavior that depends on the stylesheet origin to which the declaration belongs:
trans-unit.target: 指定取决于声明所属的样式表来源的行为。

trans-unit.source: Specifies by how far outward, in each direction, the bleed area extends past the page box. Values may be negative, but there may be implementation-specific limits.

trans-unit.source: Specifies extra inter-character space in addition to the default space between characters. Values may be negative, but there may be implementation-specific limits. User agents may not further increase or decrease the inter-character space in order to justify text.
trans-unit.target: 除了字符之间的默认间隔外，还指定额外的字符间间隔。值可能为负，但可能存在特定于实现的限制。用户代理不得进一步增加或减少字符间空间以证明文本合理。

trans-unit.source: Specifies extra spacing as a percentage of the affected character’s advance width.
trans-unit.target: 指定额外的间距，以占受影响角色的前进宽度的百分比表示。

trans-unit.source: Specifies extra spacing in addition to the intrinsic inter-word spacing defined by the font.
trans-unit.target: 在字体定义的固有字间距之外,指定额外的字间距。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the replaced element's content object should be fitted to the containing element's box.

trans-unit.source: Specifies participation in first- or last-baseline alignment: aligns the alignment baseline of the box’s first or last baseline set with the corresponding baseline in the shared first or last baseline set of all the boxes in its baseline-sharing group.
trans-unit.target: 指定参与第一个或最后一个基线对齐方式：将框的第一个或最后一个基线集的对齐基线与其基线共享组中所有框的共享的第一个或最后一个基线集中的对应基线对齐。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that all the element's properties should be changed to their inherited values.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that all the element's properties should be changed to their initial values.
trans-unit.target: 指定应将所有元素的属性更改为其初始值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that all the element's properties should be changed to their inherited values if they inherit by default, or to their initial values if not.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that both A and B elements are selected. This is a grouping method to select several matching elements.
Specifies that font-face is an italicized version of the normal font.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that no image is used as the marker. If this value is set, the marker defined in list-style-type will be used instead.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that no rotation should be applied.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the element selected by B is a descendant of the element selected by A, but is not necessarily a direct child.
Specifies that the element selected by B is located within the table column specified by A. Elements which span multiple columns are considered to be a member of all of those columns.
Specifies that the element selected by B is the direct child of the element selected by A.
Specifies that the elements selected by both A and B have the same parent and that the element selected by B immediately follows the element selected by A horizontally.
Specifies that the elements selected by both A and B share the same parent and that the element selected by A comes before—but not necessarily immediately before—the element selected by B.
Specifies that the font-face is an artificially sloped version of the normal font.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the duration over which transitions should occur. You can specify a single duration that applies to all properties during the transition, or multiple values to allow each property to transition over a different period of time.
trans-unit.target: 指定应发生过渡的持续时间。您可以指定在过渡期间适用于所有属性的单一持续时间,也可以指定多个值以允许每个属性在不同的时间段内进行过渡。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the extent beyond the page box at which the page rendering is clipped.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the keywords and functions related to the font-variant-alternates longhand property.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the keywords related to the font-variant-ligatures longhand property. The possible values are: common-ligatures, no-common-ligatures, discretionary-ligatures, no-discretionary-ligatures, historical-ligatures, no-historical-ligatures, contextual, and no-contextual.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of a locally-installed font face using the local() function, which uniquely identifies a single font face within a larger family. The name can optionally be enclosed in quotes.
Specifies the name of the @keyframes at-rule describing the animation’s keyframes.

trans-unit.target: 指定应该应用过渡的CSS属性的名称。只有这里列出的属性才会在转换过程中产生动画效果,其他属性的改变会像往常一样即时发生。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the offset of the snap coordinates from the start edge of the element’s border box. For each pairing, the first value gives the x coordinate of the snap coordinate, the second value its y coordinate.
trans-unit.target: 指定捕捉坐标从元素边框的起始边缘开始的偏移量。对于每个配对，第一个值给出捕捉坐标的x坐标，第二个值给出其y坐标。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the offset of the snap destination from the start edge of the scroll container’s visual viewport. The first value gives the x coordinate of the snap destination, the second value its y coordinate.
trans-unit.target: 指定从滚动容器的可视视口的开始边缘到捕捉目标的偏移量。第一个值给出捕捉目标的x坐标，第二个值给出y坐标。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the offset of underlines as a <length>, overriding the font file suggestion and the browser default. It is recommended to use em units so the offset scales with the font size.

Specifies the offset of underlines as a <percentage> of 1 em in the element's font. A percentage inherits as a relative value, and so therefore scales with changes in the font. For a given application of this property, the offset is constant across the whole box that the underline is applied to, even if there are child elements with different font sizes or vertical alignment.
Specifies the position of individual snap-points as a comma-separated list of percentages, each of which represents a zoom factor.
trans-unit.target: 以逗号分隔的百分比列表形式指定单个快照点的位置,每个百分比代表一个缩放系数。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the position of individual snap-points as a comma-separated list of values, each of which represents a zoom factor.
trans-unit.target: 以逗号分隔的列表形式指定单个快照点的位置,每个列表代表一个缩放系数。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the position of the origin. By default it is at the center of the element and can be moved. It is used by several transforms, like rotations, scaling or skewing, that need a specific point as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 指定原点的位置。默认情况下,原点在元素的中心位置,可以移动。它被一些需要特定点作为参数的变换(如旋转、缩放或倾斜)所使用。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the position of the origin. By default, it is at the center of the element and can be moved. It is used by several transforms, like rotations, scaling or skewing, that need a specific point as a parameter.
Specifies the resource containing the font data. This can be a URL to a remote font file location or the name of a font on the user's computer.
trans-unit.target: 指定包含字体数据的资源。这可以是指向远程字体文件位置的URL,也可以是用户计算机上的字体名称。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the symbols that are to be used for the marker representations. Symbols can contain string, images or custom identifiers. How the symbols are used to construct the marker representation is up to the algorithm specified in the system descriptor. For example, if the system specified is fixed, then each of the N symbols specified in the descriptor will be used to represent the first N counter symbols. Once the specified set of symbols have exhausted, the fallback style will be used for the rest of the list.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于标记表示的符号。符号可以包含字符串、图像或自定义标识符。如何使用这些符号来构建标记表示,由系统描述符中指定的算法决定。例如,如果指定的系统是固定的,那么描述符中指定的N个符号中的每一个都将被用来表示前N个计数器符号。一旦指定的符号集用完,其余的列表将使用后备样式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the target size and orientation of the page box’s containing block. In the general case, where one page box is rendered onto one page sheet, it also indicates the size of the destination page sheet.
trans-unit.target: 指定页面框包含块的目标大小和方向。在通常情况下，将一个页面框渲染到一页纸上时，它还指示目标页纸的大小。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the thickness of the text decoration line as a <length>, overriding the font file suggestion or the browser default.

Specifies the thickness of the text decoration line as a <percentage> of 1em in the current font. A percentage inherits as a relative value, and so therefore scales with changes in the font. The browser must use a minimum of 1 device pixel. For a given application of this property, the thickness is constant across the whole box it is applied to, even if there are child elements with a different font size.

Specifies the transforms to apply to the element. It is a space separated list of transforms, which are applied one after the other, as requested by the composition operation. Composite transforms are effectively applied in order from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 指定要应用到元素的变换。它是一个用空格分隔的变换列表,按照合成操作的要求,一个接一个地应用。复合变换实际上是按照从右到左的顺序应用的。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the transforms to apply to the element. It is a space-separated list of transforms, which are applied one after the other, as requested by the composition operation. Composite transforms are effectively applied in order from right to left.
Specifies where the snap-points will be placed.

trans-unit.source: Specifies, similar to the prefix descriptor, a symbol that is appended to the marker representation. Suffixes come after the marker representation.

Starting with version 60, you can only specify a single value if it is valid for both align-content and justify-content.

Starting your exploration of grid with numbered lines is the most logical place to begin, as when you use grid layout you always have numbered lines. The lines are numbered for columns and rows, and are indexed from 1. Note that grid is indexed according to the writing mode of the document. In a left to right language such as English line 1 is on the left-hand side of the grid. If you are working in a right-to-left language then line 1 will be the far right of the grid. We will learn more about the interaction between writing modes and grids in a later guide.
trans-unit.target: 用编号行开始探索网格是最合理的开始,因为当你使用网格布局时,你总是有编号行。这些行是为列和行编号的,并从1开始索引。注意,网格是根据文档的书写模式来索引的。在从左到右的语言中,如英语,第1行在网格的左侧。如果你使用从右到左的语言,那么第1行将在网格的最右边。我们将在后面的指南中学习更多关于书写模式和网格之间的互动。

trans-unit.source: Sticky headers or footers, as styled above, stick to the top and bottom of the layout viewport, and therefore remain in view when we zoom in with the keyboard. If you pinch-zoom, the layout viewport may not be fully visible. If you magified from the middle of the layout viewport, the content expands in all four directions. If you had a sticky header or footer, they are still stuck to the top and bottom of the layout viewport, but they may not be visible at the top and bottom of the device's screen -- which is the visual viewport. The visual viewport is the currently visible portion of the layout viewport. If you scroll down, you are changing the contents of the visual viewport and bringing the bottom of the layout viewport into view, displaying the sticky footer, which will then stay stuck at the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 如上所示，粘性页眉或页脚会粘贴到布局视口的顶部和底部，因此当我们使用键盘放大时，它们仍会保留在视图中。如果捏缩放，则布局视口可能不会完全可见。如果从布局视口的中间放大，内容将在所有四个方向上扩展。如果您具有粘性的页眉或页脚，它们仍将停留在布局视口的顶部和底部，但是在设备屏幕的顶部和底部（可视视口）可能看不到。可视视口是布局视口的当前可见部分。如果向下滚动，则将更改可视视口的内容，并使布局视口的底部可见，显示粘性页脚，然后将其停留在底部。

trans-unit.source: Styles defined by the :active pseudo-class will be overridden by any subsequent link-related pseudo-class (:link, :hover, or :visited) that has at least equal specificity. To style links appropriately, put the :active rule after all other link-related rules, as defined by the LVHA-order: :link — :visited — :hover — :active.

trans-unit.source: Styles defined by the :active pseudo-class will be overridden by any subsequent link-related pseudo-class (:link, :visited, or :active) that has at least equal specificity. trans-unit.source: Such blocks are naturally called declaration blocks and declarations inside them are separated by a semi-colon, ';' (U+003B SEMICOLON). A declaration block may be empty, that is containing null declaration. White spaces around declarations are ignored. The last declaration of a block doesn't need to be terminated by a semi-colon, though it is often considered good style to do it as it prevents forgetting to add it when extending the block with another declaration.
trans-unit.target: 这样的块自然称为声明块，其内部的声明用分号' ; 分隔。（ U+003B SEMICOLON ）。声明块可能为空，其中包含空声明。声明周围的空白将被忽略。块的最后一个声明不需要用分号终止，尽管通常认为这样做很不错，因为这样做可以避免在用另一个声明扩展该块时忘记添加它。

trans-unit.source: Text data types are either <string>, a quoted series of characters, or an <ident>, a "CSS Identifier" which is an unquoted string. A <string> must be quoted with either single or double quotes. CSS Identifiers, listed in the specifications as <ident> or <custom-ident>, must be unquoted.

Text decorations are drawn across descendant text elements. This means that if an element specifies a text decoration, then a child element can't remove the decoration. For example, in the markup <p>This text has <em>some emphasized words</em> in it.</p>, the style rule p { text-decoration: underline; } would cause the entire paragraph to be underlined. The style rule em { text-decoration: none; } would not cause any change; the entire paragraph would still be underlined. However, the rule em { text-decoration: overline; } would cause a second decoration to appear on "some emphasized words".
trans-unit.target: 文本装饰跨越子代文本元素绘制。这意味着，如果一个元素指定了文本修饰，则子元素无法删除该修饰。例如，在标记 <p>This text has <em>some emphasized words</em> in it.</p> ，样式规则 p { text-decoration: underline; } 会使整个段落带有下划线。样式规则 em { text-decoration: none; } 不会引起任何改变；整个段落仍会强调。但是，规则 em { text-decoration: overline; } 将导致第二修饰出现在“一些强调的单词”上。

The length defines at which point between two color stops the gradient color should reach the midpoint of the color transition. If omitted, the midpoint of the color transition is the midpoint between two color stops.

trans-unit.source: That’s all I need. I don’t need to do any calculations, grid automatically removed my 10 pixel gutter track before assigning the space to the 1fr column tracks. As you start to build out your own layouts, you will find that the syntax becomes more familiar and you choose the ways that work best for you and the type of projects you like to build. Try building some common patterns with these various methods, and you will soon find your most productive way to work. Then, in the next guide we will look at how grid can position items for us - without us needing to use placement properties at all!
trans-unit.target: 这就是我所需要的。我不需要进行任何计算，在将空间分配给 1fr 列轨道之前，grid会自动删除我的10像素装订线轨道。在开始构建自己的布局时，您会发现语法变得更加熟悉，并且选择了最适合自己的方式以及要构建的项目类型。尝试使用这些各种方法构建一些通用模式，您很快就会找到最有效的工作方式。然后，在下一个指南中，我们将了解网格如何为我们定位项目-根本不需要使用放置属性！

trans-unit.source: The !important exception

The "client" coordinate system uses as its origin the top-left corner of the viewport or browsing context in which the event occurred. This is the entire viewing area in which the document is presented. Scrolling is not a factor.
trans-unit.target: "客户端 "坐标系以事件发生的视口或浏览上下文的左上角为原点。这就是文档呈现的整个浏览区域。滚动不是一个因素。

trans-unit.source: The "hard" hyphen character indicates a visible line break opportunity. Even if the line is not actually broken at that point, the hyphen is still rendered.
trans-unit.target: 硬 "连字符表示一个可见的断行机会。即使此时行没有实际断行,连字符也会被呈现。

trans-unit.source: The "page" coordinate system gives the position of a pixel relative to the top-left corner of the entire Document in which the pixel is located. That means that a given point in an element within the document will keep the same coordinates in the page model unless the element moves (either directly by changing its position or indirectly by adding or resizing other content).
trans-unit.target: “页面”坐标系给出了像素相对于像素所在的整个 Document 左上角的位置。这意味着文档中元素的给定点将在页面模型中保持相同的坐标，除非元素移动（直接通过更改其位置或通过添加或调整其他内容的大小间接移动）。

The align-content property aligns a flex container's lines within the flex container when there is extra space in the cross-axis, similar to how justify-content aligns individual items within the main axis. Note that this property has no effect when the flexbox has only a single line.
trans-unit.target: 当横轴上有多余的空间时， align-content 属性将flex容器内的行对齐在flex容器内，类似于 justify-content 在主轴内对齐单个项目的方式。请注意，当flexbox只有一行时，此属性无效。

trans-unit.source: The align-content property applies to the block axis and justify-content to the inline axis. Any spacing added to the columns due to use of space distribution will be added to the gap between the columns, therefore making the gap larger than might be specified by the column-gap property.
trans-unit.target: 在 align-content 属性适用于阻光轴和 justify-content 于一字形轴。由于使用了空间分布而增加到列的任何间距都将添加到列之间的间隙中，因此使该间隙大于 column-gap 属性指定的间隙。

trans-unit.source: The align-content property applies to the block axis in order to align the contents of the box within its container. If a content distribution method such as space-between, space-around or space-evenly is requested then the fallback alignment will be used, as the content is treated as a single alignment subject.
trans-unit.target: 在 align-content 属性适用于阻光轴以它的容器内对准框的内容。如果内容分发方法，例如 space-between ， space-around 或 space-evenly 被请求，则回退对准将被使用，作为内容作为单一治疗对准受试者。

trans-unit.source: The align-items property sets the align-self property for all of the child grid items. This means that you can set the property individually, by using align-self on a grid item.
trans-unit.target: 该 align-items 属性设置 align-self 为所有子网格项目的属性。这意味着您可以通过在网格项目上使用 align-self 来分别设置属性。

trans-unit.source: The align-items property will align the items on the cross axis.
trans-unit.target: 该 align-items 属性将对齐的十字轴的项目。

trans-unit.source: The align-self and align-items properties control alignment on the block axis. When we use these properties, we are changing the alignment of the item within the grid area you have placed it.
trans-unit.target: 在 align-self 和 align-items 属性控制所述块轴线对准。使用这些属性时，我们正在更改项目在您放置的网格区域内的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: The align-self property does not apply to block-level boxes (including floats), because there is more than one item in the block axis. It also does not apply to table cells.
trans-unit.target: 该 align-self 属性不适用于块级盒（包括花车），因为在该块轴的多个项目。它也不适用于表格单元格。

trans-unit.source: The background-size CSS property makes it possible to adjust the width and height of background images, thus overriding the default behavior which tiles background images at their full size. You can scale the image upward or downward as desired.
trans-unit.target: 该 background-size CSS属性使得它可以调整背景图像的宽度和高度，从而覆盖在它们的全尺寸瓷砖背景图片的默认行为。您可以根据需要向上或向下缩放图像。

trans-unit.source: The column-gap property was specified in earlier versions of the multiple-column layout specification, and has now been unified with the gap properties for other layout methods in box alignment. While other layout methods treat the initial value of column-gap as 0 multicol treats it as 1em, as in general you would not want to have no gap between columns.
trans-unit.target: 该 column-gap 财产是在早期版本的多列布局规范的规定，现在已经被统一为在盒子对准其他布局方法的差距属性。虽然其他布局方法将column-gap的初始值视为0，但multicol会将其视为1em，因为通常您不希望列之间没有间隙。

trans-unit.source: The counter() function has two forms: 'counter(name)' or 'counter(name, style)'. The generated text is the value of the innermost counter of the given name in scope at the given pseudo-element.The counter is rendered in the specified style (decimal by default).

The counters() function also has two forms: 'counters(name, string)' or 'counters(name, string, style)'. The generated text is the value of all counters with the given name in scope at the given pseudo-element, from outermost to innermost, separated by the specified string. The counters are rendered in the specified style (decimal by default).

The CSS Animations specification doesn't offer a way to run an animation again. There's no magic resetAnimation() method on elements, and you can't even just set the element's animation-play-state to "running" again. Instead, you have to use clever tricks to get a stopped animation to replay.
trans-unit.target: 该CSS动画规范没有提供一种方式来再次运行动画。元素上没有神奇的 resetAnimation() 方法，您甚至不能仅将元素的 animation-play-state 再次设置为 "running" 。相反，您必须使用巧妙的技巧来使已停止的动画重播。

trans-unit.source: The Box Alignment Specification details how alignment works in various layout methods. In this page we explore how box alignment works in the context of block layout, including floated, positioned, and table elements. As this page aims to detail things which are specific to block layout and box alignment, it should be read in conjunction with the main Box Alignment page, which details the common features of box alignment across layout methods.
trans-unit.target: 该框对齐规格细节比对各种布局方法是如何工作的。在此页面中，我们探索框对齐在块布局（包括浮动元素，定位元素和表格元素）的上下文中如何工作。由于此页面旨在详细说明特定于块布局和框对齐的内容，因此应与“ 框对齐”主页面一起阅读，该页面详细介绍了跨布局方法的框对齐的常见功能。

trans-unit.source: The CSS Logical Properties and Values specification includes logical versions of the properties that control margins, padding and borders as well as other mappings for things that we have typically used physical directions to specify.
trans-unit.target: 该CSS逻辑属性和值规范包括控制利润率，填充和边框以及其它映射的事情，我们通常使用的物理方向指定属性的逻辑版本。

trans-unit.source: The flex property specifies the components of a flexible length; flex-grow factor, flex-shrink factor, and the flex-basis. When an element is a flex item, flex is consulted instead of the main size property to determine the main size of the element. If an element is not a flex item, flex has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 的 flex 属性指定的柔性长度的组件; flex-grow factor， flex-shrink factor和 flex-basis 。当元素是flex项目时，将使用 flex 而不是main size属性来确定元素的主要大小。如果元素不是弹性项目，则 flex 无效。

trans-unit.source: The flex-basis property is set to auto.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-basis 属性设置为 auto 。

trans-unit.source: The flex-basis property sets the flex basis. Negative lengths are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-basis 属性设置柔性基础。负长度无效。

trans-unit.source: The flex-basis property specifies the initial size of the flex item before any space distribution happens. The initial value for this property is auto. If flex-basis is set to auto then to work out the initial size of the item the browser first checks if the main size of the item has an absolute size set. This would be the case if you had given your item a width of 200 pixels. In that case 200px would be the flex-basis for this item.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-basis 属性指定的任何空间分布发生之前柔性项目的初始大小。此属性的初始值为 auto 。如果 flex-basis 设置为 auto ，则要计算出商品的初始尺寸，浏览器会首先检查商品的主尺寸是否设置了绝对尺寸。如果您为商品指定了200像素的宽度，情况就是这样。在这种情况下， 200px 将是该项目的 flex-basis 。

trans-unit.source: The flex-direction property can take one of four values:
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-direction 财产可以采取四个值之一：

trans-unit.source: The flex-direction property specifies how flex items are placed in the flex container, by setting the direction of the flex container's main axis. This determines the direction in which flex items are laid out in.
trans-unit.target: 的 flex-direction 属性指定如何柔性物品被放置在所述柔性容器，通过设置在柔性容器的主轴线的方向。这确定了弹性项目的布置方向。

trans-unit.source: The flex-flow property is shorthand for setting the flex-direction and flex-wrap properties, which together define the flex container's main and cross axes.
trans-unit.target: 的 flex-flow 属性是用于设定速记 flex-direction 和 flex-wrap 的特性，它们一起限定所述柔性容器的主要和交叉轴。

trans-unit.source: The flex-grow property sets the flex grow factor. Negative numbers are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-grow 属性设置柔性成长的因素。负数无效。

trans-unit.source: The flex-grow property specifies the flex grow factor, which determines how much the flex item will grow relative to the rest of the flex items in the flex container when the positive free space is distributed.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-grow 属性指定弯曲增长的因素，这决定了有多少当正的自由空间分布的柔性项目将相对增长到柔性容器的柔性物品的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: The flex-shrink property sets the flex shrink factor. Negative numbers are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-shrink 属性设置弹性收缩的因素。负数无效。

trans-unit.source: The flex-shrink property specifies the flex shrink factor, which determines how much the flex item will shrink relative to the rest of the flex items in the flex container when negative free space is distributed.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-shrink 属性指定弯曲收缩因素，这决定了有多少时负的自由空间分布的柔性项目将收缩相对于柔性容器的柔性物品的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: The flex-wrap property controls whether the flex container is single-lined or multi-lined and the direction of the cross-axis, which determines the direction in which the new lines are stacked in.
trans-unit.target: 的 flex-wrap 属性控制所述柔性容器是单衬里或多行和横轴，其确定新的线条重叠的方向的方向。

trans-unit.source: The flex-wrap property is set to nowrap.
trans-unit.target: 在 flex-wrap 属性设置为 nowrap 。

trans-unit.target: 该 grid-template 属性设置以下属性：

trans-unit.source: The justify-content property aligns flex items along the main axis of the current line of the flex container. This is done after any flexible lengths and any auto margins have been resolved. Typically, it helps to distribute extra free space leftover when either all the flex items on a line are inflexible, or are flexible but have reached their maximum size. It also exerts some control over the alignment of items when they overflow the line.
trans-unit.target: 该 justify-content 属性对齐沿着曲容器的当前行的主轴弯曲的物品。在解决了任何灵活的长度和任何自动边距之后，便可以执行此操作。通常，当行中的所有伸缩项目都不灵活或已达到最大大小时，它有助于分配剩余的剩余可用空间。当项目溢出线时，它还对项目的对齐方式施加一些控制。

trans-unit.source: The justify-content property does not apply to block containers or table cells.
trans-unit.target: 该 justify-content 属性不适用于块容器或表格单元格。

trans-unit.source: The justify-content property is used to align the items on the main axis, the direction in which flex-direction has set the flow. The initial value is flex-start which will line the items up at the start edge of the container, but you could also set the value to flex-end to line them up at the end, or center to line them up in the centre.
trans-unit.target: 的 justify-content 属性被用于对准在主轴线的物品，其中，所述方向 flex-direction 已设定的流量。初始值为 flex-start ，它将在容器的开始边缘对齐项目，但您也可以将值设置为 flex-end 以在末尾对齐它们，或将其 center 以在中心对齐。

trans-unit.source: The justify-self and justify-items properties are not implemented in flexbox. This is due to the one-dimensional nature of flexbox, and that there may be multiple items along the axis, making it impossible to justify a single item. To align items along the main, inline axis in flexbox you use the justify-content property.
trans-unit.target: 该 justify-self 和 justify-items 属性不会在Flexbox的实现。这是由于flexbox的一维特性所致，并且沿轴可能有多个项目，因此无法证明单个项目的合理性。要沿Flexbox的主内联轴对齐项目，请使用 justify-content 属性。

trans-unit.source: The justify-self property is used to align an item inside its containing block on the inline axis.
trans-unit.target: 的 justify-self 属性用于对准在字形轴其包含块内的项目。

trans-unit.source: The linear-gradient() and radial-gradient() properties don't support automatically repeated color stops. However, the repeating-linear-gradient() and repeating-radial-gradient() properties are available to offer this functionality.
trans-unit.target: 的 linear-gradient() 和 radial-gradient() 属性不支持自动地重复颜色停止。但是， repeating-linear-gradient() 和 repeating-radial-gradient() 属性可用于提供此功能。

trans-unit.source: The linear-gradient(), radial-gradient(), and conic-gradient functions don't support automatically repeated color stops. However, the repeating-linear-gradient(), repeating-radial-gradient(), and repeating-conic-gradient() functions are available to offer this functionality.

The top and bottom margins of blocks are sometimes combined (collapsed) into a single margin whose size is the largest of the individual margins (or just one of them, if they are equal), a behavior known as margin collapsing. Note that the margins of floating and absolutely positioned elements never collapse.
trans-unit.target: 块的顶部和底部边距有时被合并（折叠）为单个边距，其大小是各个边距中的最大值（如果相等，则为其中之一），这种行为称为边距折叠。请注意，浮动元素和绝对定位元素的边距永远不会崩溃。

trans-unit.source: The order property controls the order in which flex items appear within their flex container, by assigning them to ordinal groups.
trans-unit.target: 该 order 属性控制在弯曲的物品出现在他们的柔性容器中，通过将它们分配到有序组的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The orphans and widows properties are also useful. The orphans property controls the number of lines left on their own at the end of a fragment. The widows property controls the number left on their own at the start of a fragment.
trans-unit.target: 将 orphans 和 widows 性能也非常有用。orphans属性控制片段末尾自行保留的行数。widows属性控制片段开始时自己留下的数字。

trans-unit.source: The place-items property is shorthand for align-items and justify-items.
The place-self property is shorthand for align-self and justify-self.

The resize property sets whether or not an item can be resized and has physical values of horizontal and vertical. The resize property also has logical keyword values. Using resize: inline allows resizing in the inline dimension and resize: block allow resizing in the block dimension.
trans-unit.target: 的 resize 属性设置是否一个项目可以被调整大小，并且具有物理值 horizontal 和 vertical 。该 resize 属性也有逻辑关键字值。使用 resize: inline 允许调整内联维度的 resize: block ，resize：block允许调整区块维度的大小。

trans-unit.source: The scroll-margin property can be set set on child elements, essentially defining an outset from the defined box. This allows for different amounts of space for different child elements, and can be used in conjunction with scroll-padding on the parent. Try this in the example below.

The scroll-snap-align property can take a value of start, end, or center — indicating the point the content should snap to in the scroll container. In the below example you can change the value of scroll-snap-align to see how this changes the scroll behavior.

The scroll-snap-stop property tells the browser whether it should snap to each defined snap point — meaning that in our examples above we would stop at the start of each section — or be able to skip past sections. This property has fewer browser implementations than the rest of the specification.
The scroll-snap-type property has become a longhand, so the old shorthand syntax like scroll-snap-type:mandatory will stop working

The scroll-snap-type property needs to know the direction in which scroll snapping happens. This could be x or y, or the logical mappings block or inline. You can also use the keyword both to have scroll snapping work along both axes.
The scroll-snap-type-x and scroll-snap-type-y properties have been dropped

The shape-image-threshold property enables the creation of shapes from areas which are not fully transparent. If the value of shape-image-threshold is 0.0 (which is the initial value) then the area must be fully transparent. If the value is 1.0 then it is fully opaque. Values in between mean that you can set a semi-transparent area as the defining area.
trans-unit.target: 的 shape-image-threshold 属性使形状的来自不是完全透明区域的产生。如果 shape-image-threshold 的值为 0.0 （这是初始值），则该区域必须完全透明。如果值为 1.0 ,则它是完全不透明的。之间的值意味着您可以将半透明区域设置为定义区域。

trans-unit.source: The shape-margin property adds a margin to shape-outside. This will further shorten the line boxes of any content wrapping the shape, pushing it away from the shape itself.
trans-unit.target: 该 shape-margin 属性来添加余量 shape-outside 。这将进一步缩短包裹该形状的任何内容的线框，将其推离该形状本身。

trans-unit.source: The text-align property has logical values that relate to text direction — rather than using left and right we can use start and end. In the below example I have set text-align: right in the first block and text-align: end in the second.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-align 属性具有涉及到的文字方向逻辑值-而不是使用 left 和 right ，我们可以使用 start 和 end 。在下面的例子中我有组 text-align: right 在第一块和 text-align: end 中的第二个。

trans-unit.source: The writing-mode property accepts the values horizontal-tb, vertical-rl and vertical-lr. These values control the direction that blocks flow on the page. The initial value is horizontal-tb, which is a top to bottom block flow direction with a horizontal inline direction. Left to right languages, such as English, and Right to left languages. such as Arabic, are all horizontal-tb.
trans-unit.target: 在 writing-mode 属性接受的值 horizontal-tb ， vertical-rl 和 vertical-lr 。这些值控制阻止页面上的流的方向。初始值为 horizontal-tb, 它是从上到下的块流动方向，水平为行内方向。从左到右的语言（例如英语）和从右到左的语言。例如阿拉伯语，都是 horizontal-tb 。

trans-unit.source: The height, top, and bottom properties compute percentage values from the height of the containing block.

The user agent will scale an image when the page author specifies dimensions other than its natural size. Scaling may also occur due to user interaction (zooming). This property has no effect on non-scaled images.

The CSSplace-itemsshorthand property allows you to align items along both the block and inline directions at once (i.e. the align-items and justify-items properties) in a relevant layout system such as Grid or Flexbox. If the second value is not set, the first value is also used for it.

The CSSplace-itemsshorthand property sets both the align-items and justify-items properties. The first value is the align-items property value, the second the justify-items one. If the second value is not present, the first value is also used for it.

trans-unit.source: The counter function has two forms: 'counter(name)' or 'counter(name, style)'. The generated text is the value of the innermost counter of the given name in scope at the given pseudo-element. It is formatted in the specified <list-style-type> (decimal by default).

The counters function also has two forms: 'counters(name, string)' or 'counters(name, string, style)'. The generated text is the value of all counters with the given name in scope at the given pseudo-element, from outermost to innermost, separated by the specified string. The counters are rendered in the indicated <list-style-type> (decimal by default).

The blur() fucntion applies a Gaussian blur to the input image. The value of radius defines the value of the standard deviation to the Gaussian function, or how many pixels on the screen blend into each other, so a larger value will create more blur. The lacuna value for interpolation is 0. The parameter is specified as a CSS length, but does not accept percentage values.

The brightness() function applies a linear multiplier to the input image, making it appear more or less bright. A value of 0% will create an image that is completely black. A value of 100% leaves the input unchanged. Other values are linear multipliers on the effect. Values of an amount over 100% are allowed, providing brighter results. The lacuna value for interpolation is 1.

The contrast() function adjusts the contrast of the input image. A value of 0% will create an image that is completely gray. A value of 100% leaves the input unchanged. Values of an amount over 100% are allowed, providing results with more contrast. The lacuna value for interpolation is 1.

The drop-shadow() function applies a drop shadow effect to the input image. A drop shadow is effectively a blurred, offset version of the input image's alpha mask drawn in a particular color, composited below the image. The function accepts a parameter of type <shadow> (defined in CSS3 Backgrounds), with the exception that the inset keyword and spread parameter are not allowed. This function is similar to the more established box-shadow property; the difference is that with filters, some browsers provide hardware acceleration for better performance. The parameters of the <shadow> parameter are as follows:

The grayscale() function converts the input image to grayscale. The value of amount defines the proportion of the conversion. A value of 100% is completely grayscale. A value of 0% leaves the input unchanged. Values between 0% and 100% are linear multipliers on the effect. The lacuna value for interpolation is 0.

The hue-rotate() function applies a hue rotation on the input image. The value of angle defines the number of degrees around the color circle the input samples will be adjusted. A value of 0deg leaves the input unchanged. The lacuna value for interpolation is 0. Though there is no maximum value; the effect of values above 360deg wraps around.

The invert() function inverts the samples in the input image. The value of amount defines the proportion of the conversion. A value of 100% is completely inverted. A value of 0% leaves the input unchanged. Values between 0% and 100% are linear multipliers on the effect. The lacuna value for interpolation is 0.

The opacity() function applies transparency to the samples in the input image. The value of amount defines the proportion of the conversion. A value of 0% is completely transparent. A value of 100% leaves the input unchanged. Values between 0% and 100% are linear multipliers on the effect. This is equivalent to multiplying the input image samples by amount. The lacuna value for interpolation is 1. This function is similar to the more established opacity property; the difference is that with filters, some browsers provide hardware acceleration for better performance.

The saturate() function saturates the input image. The value of amount defines the proportion of the conversion. A value of 0% is completely un-saturated. A value of 100% leaves the input unchanged. Other values are linear multipliers on the effect. Values of amount over 100% are allowed, providing super-saturated results. The lacuna value for interpolation is 1.

The sepia() function converts the input image to sepia. The value of amount defines the proportion of the conversion. A value of 100% is completely sepia. A value of 0% leaves the input unchanged. Values between 0% and 100% are linear multipliers on the effect. The lacuna value for interpolation is 0.

trans-unit.source: The subgrid value of grid-template-columns and grid-template-rows will solve this problem once widely implemented. It will allow the grid to be inherited by grid items and passed dow the tree.
The table content model may create a table wrapper box and a table box, but also specific boxes like caption boxes.
trans-unit.target: 该表的内容模型可以创建一个表的包装盒和表盒，而且具体的，而像标题框。

trans-unit.source: The text-decoration property is a shorthand for setting most text-decoration properties, including text-decoration-line, text-decoration-color, and text-decoration-style. However, it does not set text-underline-position.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-decoration 属性是用于设置大多数文本装饰特性，包括速记 text-decoration-line ， text-decoration-color 和 text-decoration-style 。但是，它没有设置 text-underline-position 。

trans-unit.source: The var() function
The white-space property

The width and height properties include the content, padding, and border, but do not include the margin. Note that padding and border will be inside of the box. For example, .box {width: 350px; border: 10px solid black;} renders a box that is 350px wide, with the area for content being 330px wide. The content box can't be negative and is floored to 0, making it impossible to use border-box to make the element disappear.

The width and height properties include the content, padding, and border, but do not include the margin. Note that padding and border will be inside of the box. For example, .box {width: 350px; border: 10px solid black;} renders a box that is 350px wide. The content box can't be negative and is floored to 0, making it impossible to use border-box to make the element disappear.
trans-unit.target: 在 width 和 height 的属性包括内容，填充和边界，但不包括保证金。请注意，填充和边框将在框内。例如， .box {width: 350px; border: 10px solid black;} 渲染一个350像素宽的框。内容框不能为负，且底限为0，因此无法使用 border-box 使元素消失。

trans-unit.source: The <blend-mode>CSSdata type describes how colors should appear when elements overlap. It is used in the background-blend-mode and mix-blend-mode properties.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <blend-mode> CSS 数据类型描述了当元素重叠颜色应该如何显示。它在 background-blend-mode 和 mix-blend-mode 属性中使用。

trans-unit.source: The <color>CSSdata type represents a color in the sRGB color space. A <color> may also include an alpha-channeltransparency value, indicating how the color should composite with its background.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <color> CSS 数据类型表示在一个颜色sRGB色彩空间。甲 <color> 还可以包括alpha通道透明度值，指示如何颜色应该复合其背景。

trans-unit.source: The <custom-ident>CSSdata type denotes an arbitrary user-defined string used as an identifier. It is case-sensitive, and certain values are forbidden in various contexts to prevent ambiguity.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <custom-ident> CSS 数据类型表示用作一个任意的用户定义的字符串的标识符。它区分大小写，在各种情况下都禁止使用某些值以防止歧义。

The <display-outside> keywords specify the element’s outer display type, which is essentially its role in flow layout. These keywords are used as values of the display property, and can be used for legacy purposes as a single keyword, or as defined in the Level 3 specification alongside a value from the <display-inside> keywords.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <display-outside> 关键字指定该元素的外 display 类型，这基本上是其流布局的作用。这些关键字用作 display 属性的值，并且可以作为单个关键字用于旧版目的，或者如在Level 3规范中定义的，与 <display-inside> 关键字中的值一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The <easing-function>CSSdata type denotes a mathematical function that describes how fast one-dimensional values change during animations. This lets you vary the animation's speed over the course of its duration.
The <filter-function> data type is specified using one of the filter functions listed below. Each function requires an argument which, if invalid, results in no filter being applied.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <filter-function> 数据类型是使用下面列出的过滤器功能的一个指定。每个函数都需要一个参数，如果无效，该参数将导致不应用任何过滤器。
